import React from 'react' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import './style.css' import DropdownMenu from '../DropdownMenu' import dai from './images/dai.png' import {addCollateral} from './../../../contractTranscations/addCollateral' import {collateralborrowPools} from './../../../query/pool/addCollateral' export default function AddCollateralModal({showModal, openModal,address}) { const dropdownData = [ { value: 'ETH', icon: 'https://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/cjdowner/cryptocurrency-flat/256/Ethereum-ETH-icon.png' }, { value: 'USDC', icon: 'https://messari.io/asset-images/4515ba15-2719-4183-b0ca-b9255d55b67e/128.png?v=2' }, ] const icon = dai; const [dropdownSelected, setDropdownSelected] = useState(dropdownData[0]) const [borrowAsset, setborrowAsset] = useState(''); const [borrowAmount, setBorrowAmount] = useState('') const [pooldata,setpooldata] = useState([]) console.log(address) useEffect(() => { collateralborrowPools(address,setpooldata) },[showModal]); console.log(pooldata); function AddCollateral(){ console.log("address of pool "); console.log(address); addCollateral(borrowAmount,address); openModal(); } return ( {showModal ?
Provide more collateral
Borrowed amount
{pooldata.borrowed_amount}
Locked Collateral
{pooldata.collateralRatio}
How much collateral would you like to provide?
Amount
setBorrowAmount(e.target.value)} value={borrowAmount} />
New locked collateral
(45%) 200 DOT
Provide Collateral
:null} ) }
